pacman.entries.ghosts.fair

Class GhostStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.entries.ghosts.fair.GhostStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<GhostStatus>

    public class GhostStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<GhostStatus>
    The GhostStatus documents the curent status of one ghost, including its distance to Ms. Pac-Man.
    Author:
    Iris Hunkeler
